episode_summary: Rachel Adams Lee shares advanced social media strategies for real estate agents, focusing on creating shareable content and using lead magnets to capture leads. She emphasizes the importance of follow-up with personalized video messages and outlines systems for sustainable business growth. Her insights are tailored for agents looking to elevate their lead generation and conversion tactics.
